snippet.title: Monument Valley Panoramic Collection  - Behind the Scenes
snippet.description:
Find out more about the making of Monument Valley 1 and 2 Panoramic Edition, hear from the team on the development and challenges of moving the modern classic over to this entirely new format.
 

Monument Valley Panoramic Collection on Steam:
https://bit.ly/MVPanoramic


#MonumentValley #MonumentValleyPanoramic
